juzs.text: Wama anzalna AAala qawmihi min baAAdihi min jundin mina alssamai wama kunna munzileena
In kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan faitha hum khamidoona
Ya hasratan AAala alAAibadi ma yateehim min rasoolin illa kanoo bihi yastahzioona
Alam yaraw kam ahlakna qablahum mina alqurooni annahum ilayhim la yarjiAAoona
Wain kullun lamma jameeAAun ladayna muhdaroona
Waayatun lahumu alardu almaytatu ahyaynaha waakhrajna minha habban faminhu yakuloona
WajaAAalna feeha jannatin min nakheelin waaAAnabin wafajjarna feeha mina alAAuyooni
Liyakuloo min thamarihi wama AAamilathu aydeehim afala yashkuroona
Subhana allathee khalaqa alazwaja kullaha mimma tunbitu alardu wamin anfusihim wamimma la yaAAlamoona
Waayatun lahumu allaylu naslakhu minhu alnnahara faitha hum muthlimoona
Waalshshamsu tajree limustaqarrin laha thalika taqdeeru alAAazeezi alAAaleemi
Waalqamara qaddarnahu manazila hatta AAada kaalAAurjooni alqadeemi
La alshshamsu yanbaghee laha an tudrika alqamara wala allaylu sabiqu alnnahari wakullun fee falakin yasbahoona
Waayatun lahum anna hamalna thurriyyatahum fee alfulki almashhooni
Wakhalaqna lahum min mithlihi ma yarkaboona
Wain nasha nughriqhum fala sareekha lahum wala hum yunqathoona
Illa rahmatan minna wamataAAan ila heenin
Waitha qeela lahumu ittaqoo ma bayna aydeekum wama khalfakum laAAallakum turhamoona
Wama tateehim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanoo AAanha muAArideena
Waitha qeela lahum anfiqoo mimma razaqakumu Allahu qala allatheena kafaroo lillatheena amanoo anutAAimu man law yashao Allahu atAAamahu in antum illa fee dalalin mubeenin
Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeena
Ma yanthuroona illa sayhatan wahidatan takhuthuhum wahum yakhissimoona
Fala yastateeAAoona tawsiyatan wala ila ahlihim yarjiAAoona
Wanufikha fee alssoori faitha hum mina alajdathi ila rabbihim yansiloona
Qaloo ya waylana man baAAathana min marqadina hatha ma waAAada alrrahmanu wasadaqa almursaloona
In kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan faitha hum jameeAAun ladayna muhdaroona
Faalyawma la tuthlamu nafsun shayan wala tujzawna illa ma kuntum taAAmaloona
Inna ashaba aljannati alyawma fee shughulin fakihoona
Hum waazwajuhum fee thilalin AAala alaraiki muttakioona
Lahum feeha fakihatun walahum ma yaddaAAoona
Salamun qawlan min rabbin raheemin
Waimtazoo alyawma ayyuha almujrimoona
Alam aAAhad ilaykum ya banee adama an la taAAbudoo alshshaytana innahu lakum AAaduwwun mubeenun
Waani oAAbudoonee hatha siratun mustaqeemun
Walaqad adalla minkum jibillan katheeran afalam takoonoo taAAqiloona
Hathihi jahannamu allatee kuntum tooAAadoona
Islawha alyawma bima kuntum takfuroona
Alyawma nakhtimu AAala afwahihim watukallimuna aydeehim watashhadu arjuluhum bima kanoo yaksiboona
Walaw nashao latamasna AAala aAAyunihim faistabaqoo alssirata faanna yubsiroona
Walaw nashao lamasakhnahum AAala makanatihim fama istataAAoo mudiyyan wala yarjiAAoona
Waman nuAAammirhu nunakkishu fee alkhalqi afala yaAAqiloona
Wama AAallamnahu alshshiAAra wama yanbaghee lahu in huwa illa thikrun waquranun mubeenun
Liyunthira man kana hayyan wayahiqqa alqawlu AAala alkafireena
Awalam yaraw anna khalaqna lahum mimma AAamilat aydeena anAAaman fahum laha malikoona
Wathallalnaha lahum faminha rakoobuhum waminha yakuloona
Walahum feeha manafiAAu wamasharibu afala yashkuroona
Waittakhathoo min dooni Allahi alihatan laAAallahum yunsaroona
La yastateeAAoona nasrahum wahum lahum jundun muhdaroona
Fala yahzunka qawluhum inna naAAlamu ma yusirroona wama yuAAlinoona
Awalam yara alinsanu anna khalaqnahu min nutfatin faitha huwa khaseemun mubeenun
Wadaraba lana mathalan wanasiya khalqahu qala man yuhyee alAAithama wahiya rameemun
Qul yuhyeeha allathee anshaaha awwala marratin wahuwa bikulli khalqin AAaleemun
Allathee jaAAala lakum mina alshshajari alakhdari naran faitha antum minhu tooqidoona
Awalaysa allathee khalaqa alssamawati waalarda biqadirin AAala an yakhluqa mithlahum bala wahuwa alkhallaqu alAAaleemu
Innama amruhu itha arada shayan an yaqoola lahu kun fayakoonu
Fasubhana allathee biyadihi malakootu kulli shayin wailayhi turjaAAoona
Waalssaffati saffan
Faalzzajirati zajran
Faalttaliyati thikran
Inna ilahakum lawahidun
Rabbu alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma warabbu almashariqi
Inna zayyanna alssamaa alddunya bizeenatin alkawakibi
Wahifthan min kulli shaytanin maridin
La yassammaAAoona ila almalai alaAAla wayuqthafoona min kulli janibin
Duhooran walahum AAathabun wasibun
Illa man khatifa alkhatfata faatbaAAahu shihabun thaqibun
Faistaftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqna inna khalaqnahum min teenin lazibin
Bal AAajibta wayaskharoona
Waitha thukkiroo la yathkuroona
Waitha raaw ayatan yastaskhiroona
Waqaloo in hatha illa sihrun mubeenun
Aitha mitna wakunna turaban waAAithaman ainna lamabAAoothoona
Awaabaona alawwaloona
Qul naAAam waantum dakhiroona
Fainnama hiya zajratun wahidatun faitha hum yanthuroona
Waqaloo ya waylana hatha yawmu alddeeni
Hatha yawmu alfasli allathee kuntum bihi tukaththiboona
Ohshuroo allatheena thalamoo waazwajahum wama kanoo yaAAbudoona
Min dooni Allahi faihdoohum ila sirati aljaheemi
Waqifoohum innahum masooloona
Ma lakum la tanasaroona
Bal humu alyawma mustaslimoona
Waaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdin yatasaaloona
Qaloo innakum kuntum tatoonana AAani alyameeni
Qaloo bal lam takoonoo mumineena
Wama kana lana AAalaykum min sultanin bal kuntum qawman tagheena
Fahaqqa AAalayna qawlu rabbina inna lathaiqoona
Faaghwaynakum inna kunna ghaweena
Fainnahum yawmaithin fee alAAathabi mushtarikoona
Inna kathalika nafAAalu bialmujrimeena
Innahum kanoo itha qeela lahum la ilaha illa Allahu yastakbiroona
Wayaqooloona ainna latarikoo alihatina lishaAAirin majnoonin
Bal jaa bialhaqqi wasaddaqa almursaleena
Innakum lathaiqoo alAAathabi alaleemi
Wama tujzawna illa ma kuntum taAAmaloona
Illa AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena
Olaika lahum rizqun maAAloomun
Fawakihu wahum mukramoona
Fee jannati alnnaAAeemi
AAala sururin mutaqabileena
Yutafu AAalayhim bikasin min maAAeenin
Baydaa laththatin lilshsharibeena
La feeha ghawlun wala hum AAanha yunzafoona
WaAAindahum qasiratu alttarfi AAeenun
Kaannahunna baydun maknoonun
Faaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdin yatasaaloona
Qala qailun minhum innee kana lee qareenun
Yaqoolu ainnaka lamina almusaddiqeena
Aitha mitna wakunna turaban waAAithaman ainna lamadeenoona
Qala hal antum muttaliAAoona
FaittalaAAa faraahu fee sawai aljaheemi
Qala taAllahi in kidta laturdeeni
Walawla niAAmatu rabbee lakuntu mina almuhdareena
Afama nahnu bimayyiteena
Illa mawtatana aloola wama nahnu bimuAAaththabeena
Inna hatha lahuwa alfawzu alAAatheemu
Limithli hatha falyaAAmali alAAamiloona
Athalika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu alzzaqqoomi
Inna jaAAalnaha fitnatan lilththalimeena
Innaha shajaratun takhruju fee asli aljaheemi
TalAAuha kaannahu ruoosu alshshayateeni
Fainnahum laakiloona minha famalioona minha albutoona
Thumma inna lahum AAalayha lashawban min hameemin
Thumma inna marjiAAahum laila aljaheemi
Innahum alfaw abaahum dalleena
Fahum AAala atharihim yuhraAAoona
Walaqad dalla qablahum aktharu alawwaleena
Walaqad arsalna feehim munthireena
Faonthur kayfa kana AAaqibatu almunthareena
Illa AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena
Walaqad nadana noohun falaniAAma almujeeboona
Wanajjaynahu waahlahu mina alkarbi alAAatheemi
WajaAAalna thurriyyatahu humu albaqeena
Watarakna AAalayhi fee alakhireena
Salamun AAala noohin fee alAAalameena
Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena
Innahu min AAibadina almumineena
Thumma aghraqna alakhareena
Wainna min sheeAAatihi laibraheema
Ith jaa rabbahu biqalbin saleemin
Ith qala liabeehi waqawmihi matha taAAbudoona
Aifkan alihatan doona Allahi tureedoona
Fama thannukum birabbi alAAalameena
Fanathara nathratan fee alnnujoomi
Faqala innee saqeemun
Fatawallaw AAanhu mudbireena
Faragha ila alihatihim faqala ala takuloona
Ma lakum la tantiqoona
Faragha AAalayhim darban bialyameeni
Faaqbaloo ilayhi yaziffoona
Qala ataAAbudoona ma tanhitoona
WaAllahu khalaqakum wama taAAmaloona
Qaloo ibnoo lahu bunyanan faalqoohu fee aljaheemi
Faaradoo bihi kaydan fajaAAalnahumu alasfaleena
Waqala innee thahibun ila rabbee sayahdeeni
Rabbi hab lee mina alssaliheena
Fabashsharnahu bighulamin haleemin
Falamma balagha maAAahu alssaAAya qala ya bunayya innee ara fee almanami annee athbahuka faonthur matha tara qala ya abati ifAAal ma tumaru satajidunee in shaa Allahu mina alssabireena
Falamma aslama watallahu liljabeeni
Wanadaynahu an ya ibraheemu
Qad saddaqta alrruya inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena
Inna hatha lahuwa albalao almubeenu
Wafadaynahu bithibhin AAatheemin
Watarakna AAalayhi fee alakhireena
Salamun AAala ibraheema
Kathalika najzee almuhsineena
Innahu min AAibadina almumineena
Wabashsharnahu biishaqa nabiyyan mina alssaliheena
Wabarakna AAalayhi waAAala ishaqa wamin thurriyyatihima muhsinun wathalimun linafsihi mubeenun
Walaqad mananna AAala moosa waharoona
Wanajjaynahuma waqawmahuma mina alkarbi alAAatheemi
Wanasarnahum fakanoo humu alghalibeena
Waataynahuma alkitaba almustabeena
Wahadaynahuma alssirata almustaqeema
Watarakna AAalayhima fee alakhireena
Salamun AAala moosa waharoona
Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena
Innahuma min AAibadina almumineena
Wainna ilyasa lamina almursaleena
Ith qala liqawmihi ala tattaqoona
AtadAAoona baAAlan watatharoona ahsana alkhaliqeena
Allaha rabbakum warabba abaikumu alawwaleena
Fakaththaboohu fainnahum lamuhdaroona
Illa AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena
Watarakna AAalayhi fee alakhireena
Salamun AAala il yaseena
Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena
Innahu min AAibadina almumineena
Wainna lootan lamina almursaleena
Ith najjaynahu waahlahu ajmaAAeena
Illa AAajoozan fee alghabireena
Thumma dammarna alakhareena
Wainnakum latamurroona AAalayhim musbiheena
Wabiallayli afala taAAqiloona
Wainna yoonusa lamina almursaleena
Ith abaqa ila alfulki almashhooni
Fasahama fakana mina almudhadeena
Failtaqamahu alhootu wahuwa muleemun
Falawla annahu kana mina almusabbiheena
Lalabitha fee batnihi ila yawmi yubAAathoona
Fanabathnahu bialAAarai wahuwa saqeemun
Waanbatna AAalayhi shajaratan min yaqteenin
Waarsalnahu ila miati alfin aw yazeedoona
Faamanoo famattaAAnahum ila heenin
Faistaftihim alirabbika albanatu walahumu albanoona
Am khalaqna almalaikata inathan wahum shahidoona
Ala innahum min ifkihim layaqooloona
Walada Allahu wainnahum lakathiboona
Astafa albanati AAala albaneena
Ma lakum kayfa tahkumoona
Afala tathakkaroona
Am lakum sultanun mubeenun
Fatoo bikitabikum in kuntum sadiqeena
WajaAAaloo baynahu wabayna aljinnati nasaban walaqad AAalimati aljinnatu innahum lamuhdaroona
Subhana Allahi AAamma yasifoona
Illa AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena
Fainnakum wama taAAbudoona
Ma antum AAalayhi bifatineena
Illa man huwa sali aljaheemi
Wama minna illa lahu maqamun maAAloomun
Wainna lanahnu alssaffoona
Wainna lanahnu almusabbihoona
Wain kanoo layaqooloona
Law anna AAindana thikran mina alawwaleena
Lakunna AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena
Fakafaroo bihi fasawfa yaAAlamoona
Walaqad sabaqat kalimatuna liAAibadina almursaleena
Innahum lahumu almansooroona
Wainna jundana lahumu alghaliboona
Fatawalla AAanhum hatta heenin
Waabsirhum fasawfa yubsiroona
AfabiAAathabina yastaAAjiloona
Faitha nazala bisahatihim fasaa sabahu almunthareena
Watawalla AAanhum hatta heenin
Waabsir fasawfa yubsiroona
Subhana rabbika rabbi alAAizzati AAamma yasifoona
Wasalamun AAala almursaleena
Waalhamdu lillahi rabbi alAAalameena
Sad waalqurani thee alththikri
Bali allatheena kafaroo fee AAizzatin washiqaqin
Kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarnin fanadaw walata heena manasin
WaAAajiboo an jaahum munthirun minhum waqala alkafiroona hatha sahirun kaththabun
AjaAAala alalihata ilahan wahidan inna hatha lashayon AAujabun
Waintalaqa almalao minhum ani imshoo waisbiroo AAala alihatikum inna hatha lashayon yuradu
Ma samiAAna bihatha fee almillati alakhirati in hatha illa ikhtilaqun
Aonzila AAalayhi alththikru min baynina bal hum fee shakkin min thikree bal lamma yathooqoo AAathabi
Am AAindahum khazainu rahmati rabbika alAAazeezi alwahhabi
Am lahum mulku alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma falyartaqoo fee alasbabi
Jundun ma hunalika mahzoomun mina alahzabi
Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohin waAAadun wafirAAawnu thoo alawtadi
Wathamoodu waqawmu lootin waashabu alaykati olaika alahzabu
In kullun illa kaththaba alrrusula fahaqqa AAiqabi
Wama yanthuru haolai illa sayhatan wahidatan ma laha min fawaqin
Waqaloo rabbana AAajjil lana qittana qabla yawmi alhisabi
Isbir AAala ma yaqooloona waothkur AAabdana dawooda tha alaydi innahu awwabun
Inna sakhkharna aljibala maAAahu yusabbihna bialAAashiyyi waalishraqi
Waalttayra mahshooratan kullun lahu awwabun
Washadadna mulkahu waataynahu alhikmata wafasla alkhitabi
Wahal ataka nabao alkhasmi ith tasawwaroo almihraba
Ith dakhaloo AAala dawooda fafaziAAa minhum qaloo la takhaf khasmani bagha baAAduna AAala baAAdin faohkum baynana bialhaqqi wala tushtit waihdina ila sawai alssirati
Inna hatha akhee lahu tisAAun watisAAoona naAAjatan waliya naAAjatun wahidatun faqala akfilneeha waAAazzanee fee alkhitabi

Qala laqad thalamaka bisuali naAAjatika ila niAAajihi wainna katheeran mina alkhulatai layabghee baAAduhum AAala baAAdin illa allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati waqaleelun ma hum wathanna dawoodu annama fatannahu faistaghfara rabbahu wakharra rakiAAan waanaba
Faghafarna lahu thalika wainna lahu AAindana lazulfa wahusna maabin

Ya dawoodu inna jaAAalnaka khaleefatan fee alardi faohkum bayna alnnasi bialhaqqi wala tattabiAAi alhawa fayudillaka AAan sabeeli Allahi inna allatheena yadilloona AAan sabeeli Allahi lahum AAathabun shadeedun bima nasoo yawma alhisabi
Wama khalaqna alssamaa waalarda wama baynahuma batilan thalika thannu allatheena kafaroo fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo mina alnnari
Am najAAalu allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati kaalmufsideena fee alardi am najAAalu almuttaqeena kaalfujjari
Kitabun anzalnahu ilayka mubarakun liyaddabbaroo ayatihi waliyatathakkara oloo alalbabi
Wawahabna lidawooda sulaymana niAAma alAAabdu innahu awwabun
Ith AAurida AAalayhi bialAAashiyyi alssafinatu aljiyadu
Faqala innee ahbabtu hubba alkhayri AAan thikri rabbee hatta tawarat bialhijabi
Ruddooha AAalayya fatafiqa mashan bialssooqi waalaAAnaqi
Walaqad fatanna sulaymana waalqayna AAala kursiyyihi jasadan thumma anaba
Qala rabbi ighfir lee wahab lee mulkan la yanbaghee liahadin min baAAdee innaka anta alwahhabu
Fasakhkharna lahu alrreeha tajree biamrihi rukhaan haythu asaba
Waalshshayateena kulla bannain waghawwasin
Waakhareena muqarraneena fee alasfadi
Hatha AAataona faomnun aw amsik bighayri hisabin
Wainna lahu AAindana lazulfa wahusna maabin
Waothkur AAabdana ayyooba ith nada rabbahu annee massaniya alshshaytanu binusbin waAAathabin
Orkud birijlika hatha mughtasalun baridun washarabun
Wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamithlahum maAAahum rahmatan minna wathikra liolee alalbabi
Wakhuth biyadika dighthan faidrib bihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiran niAAma alAAabdu innahu awwabun
Waothkur AAibadana ibraheema waishaqa wayaAAqooba olee alaydee waalabsari
Inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatin thikra alddari
Wainnahum AAindana lamina almustafayna alakhyari
Waothkur ismaAAeela wailyasaAAa watha alkifli wakullun mina alakhyari
Hatha thikrun wainna lilmuttaqeena lahusna maabin
Jannati AAadnin mufattahatan lahumu alabwabu
Muttakieena feeha yadAAoona feeha bifakihatin katheeratin washarabin
WaAAindahum qasiratu alttarfi atrabun
Hatha ma tooAAadoona liyawmi alhisabi
Inna hatha larizquna ma lahu min nafadin
Hatha wainna lilttagheena lasharra maabin
Jahannama yaslawnaha fabisa almihadu
Hatha falyathooqoohu hameemun waghassaqun
Waakharu min shaklihi azwajun
Hatha fawjun muqtahimun maAAakum la marhaban bihim innahum saloo alnnari
Qaloo bal antum la marhaban bikum antum qaddamtumoohu lana fabisa alqararu
Qaloo rabbana man qaddama lana hatha fazidhu AAathaban diAAfan fee alnnari
Waqaloo ma lana la nara rijalan kunna naAAudduhum mina alashrari
Attakhathnahum sikhriyyan am zaghat AAanhumu alabsaru
Inna thalika lahaqqun takhasumu ahli alnnari
Qul innama ana munthirun wama min ilahin illa Allahu alwahidu alqahharu
Rabbu alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma alAAazeezu alghaffaru
Qul huwa nabaon AAatheemun
Antum AAanhu muAAridoona
Ma kana liya min AAilmin bialmalai alaAAla ith yakhtasimoona
In yooha ilayya illa annama ana natheerun mubeenun
Ith qala rabbuka lilmalaikati innee khaliqun basharan min teenin
Faitha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu feehi min roohee faqaAAoo lahu sajideena
Fasajada almalaikatu kulluhum ajmaAAoona
Illa ibleesa istakbara wakana mina alkafireena
Qala ya ibleesu ma manaAAaka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina alAAaleena
Qala ana khayrun minhu khalaqtanee min narin wakhalaqtahu min teenin
Qala faokhruj minha fainnaka rajeemun
Wainna AAalayka laAAnatee ila yawmi alddeeni
Qala rabbi faanthirnee ila yawmi yubAAathoona
Qala fainnaka mina almunthareena
Ila yawmi alwaqti almaAAloomi
Qala fabiAAizzatika laoghwiyannahum ajmaAAeena
Illa AAibadaka minhumu almukhlaseena
Qala faalhaqqu waalhaqqa aqoolu
Laamlaanna jahannama minka wamimman tabiAAaka minhum ajmaAAeena
Qul ma asalukum AAalayhi min ajrin wama ana mina almutakallifeena
In huwa illa thikrun lilAAalameena
WalataAAlamunna nabaahu baAAda heenin
Tanzeelu alkitabi mina Allahi alAAazeezi alhakeemi
Inna anzalna ilayka alkitaba bialhaqqi faoAAbudi Allaha mukhlisan lahu alddeena

Ala lillahi alddeenu alkhalisu waallatheena ittakhathoo min doonihi awliyaa ma naAAbuduhum illa liyuqarriboona ila Allahi zulfa inna Allaha yahkumu baynahum fee ma hum feehi yakhtalifoona inna Allaha la yahdee man huwa kathibun kaffarun
Law arada Allahu an yattakhitha waladan laistafa mimma yakhluqu ma yashao subhanahu huwa Allahu alwahidu alqahharu

Khalaqa alssamawati waalarda bialhaqqi yukawwiru allayla AAala alnnahari wayukawwiru alnnahara AAala allayli wasakhkhara alshshamsa waalqamara kullun yajree liajalin musamman ala huwa alAAazeezu alghaffaru

Khalaqakum min nafsin wahidatin thumma jaAAala minha zawjaha waanzala lakum mina alanAAami thamaniyata azwajin yakhluqukum fee butooni ommahatikum khalqan min baAAdi khalqin fee thulumatin thalathin thalikumu Allahu rabbukum lahu almulku la ilaha illa huwa faanna tusrafoona

In takfuroo fainna Allaha ghaniyyun AAankum wala yarda liAAibadihi alkufra wain tashkuroo yardahu lakum wala taziru waziratun wizra okhra thumma ila rabbikum marjiAAukum fayunabbiokum bima kuntum taAAmaloona innahu AAaleemun bithati alssudoori

Waitha massa alinsana durrun daAAa rabbahu muneeban ilayhi thumma itha khawwalahu niAAmatan minhu nasiya ma kana yadAAoo ilayhi min qablu wajaAAala lillahi andadan liyudilla AAan sabeelihi qul tamattaAA bikufrika qaleelan innaka min ashabi alnnari
Amman huwa qanitun anaa allayli sajidan waqaiman yahtharu alakhirata wayarjoo rahmata rabbihi qul hal yastawee allatheena yaAAlamoona waallatheena la yaAAlamoona innama yatathakkaru oloo alalbabi
Qul ya AAibadi allatheena amanoo ittaqoo rabbakum lillatheena ahsanoo fee hathihi alddunya hasanatun waardu Allahi wasiAAatun innama yuwaffa alssabiroona ajrahum bighayri hisabin
Qul innee omirtu an aAAbuda Allaha mukhlisan lahu alddeena
Waomirtu lian akoona awwala almuslimeena
Qul innee akhafu in AAasaytu rabbee AAathaba yawmin AAatheemin
Quli Allaha aAAbudu mukhlisan lahu deenee
FaoAAbudoo ma shitum min doonihi qul inna alkhasireena allatheena khasiroo anfusahum waahleehim yawma alqiyamati ala thalika huwa alkhusranu almubeenu
Lahum min fawqihim thulalun mina alnnari wamin tahtihim thulalun thalika yukhawwifu Allahu bihi AAibadahu ya AAibadi faittaqooni
Waallatheena ijtanaboo alttaghoota an yaAAbudooha waanaboo ila Allahi lahumu albushra fabashshir AAibadi
Allatheena yastamiAAoona alqawla fayattabiAAoona ahsanahu olaika allatheena hadahumu Allahu waolaika hum oloo alalbabi
Afaman haqqa AAalayhi kalimatu alAAathabi afaanta tunqithu man fee alnnari
Lakini allatheena ittaqaw rabbahum lahum ghurafun min fawqiha ghurafun mabniyyatun tajree min tahtiha alanharu waAAda Allahi la yukhlifu Allahu almeeAAada

Alam tara anna Allaha anzala mina alssamai maan fasalakahu yanabeeAAa fee alardi thumma yukhriju bihi zarAAan mukhtalifan alwanuhu thumma yaheeju fatarahu musfarran thumma yajAAaluhu hutaman inna fee thalika lathikra liolee alalbabi
Afaman sharaha Allahu sadrahu lilislami fahuwa AAala noorin min rabbihi fawaylun lilqasiyati quloobuhum min thikri Allahi olaika fee dalalin mubeenin

Allahu nazzala ahsana alhadeethi kitaban mutashabihan mathaniya taqshaAAirru minhu juloodu allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum thumma taleenu julooduhum waquloobuhum ila thikri Allahi thalika huda Allahi yahdee bihi man yashao waman yudlili Allahu fama lahu min hadin
Afaman yattaqee biwajhihi sooa alAAathabi yawma alqiyamati waqeela lilththalimeena thooqoo ma kuntum taksiboona
Kaththaba allatheena min qablihim faatahumu alAAathabu min haythu la yashAAuroona
Faathaqahumu Allahu alkhizya fee alhayati alddunya walaAAathabu alakhirati akbaru law kanoo yaAAlamoona
Walaqad darabna lilnnasi fee hatha alqurani min kulli mathalin laAAallahum yatathakkaroona
Quranan AAarabiyyan ghayra thee AAiwajin laAAallahum yattaqoona
Daraba Allahu mathalan rajulan feehi shurakao mutashakisoona warajulan salaman lirajulin hal yastawiyani mathalan alhamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la yaAAlamoona
Innaka mayyitun wainnahum mayyitoona
Thumma innakum yawma alqiyamati AAinda rabbikum takhtasimoona
